input.sentences: the babies enjoyed looking in their easter baskets !
they loved all of their treats and goodies for easter .
after baskets | we had an easter egg hunt .

output.sentences: Mom always enjoyed making and hiding our Easter baskets.
And Grandpa always loved taking the treats and goodies out.
Uncle John was the one who help us hunt for the Easter eggs in Grandpa's backyard.
Mom and Dad had to get low to help the babies find the hidden prizes.
The day always ended with lots of happy pictures of tired kids.
